component.text:
Activity:
Drag and drop the appropriate word or phrase to complete the sentences. Not all answers are used. Some sentences have more than one correct answer.
WAN operations occur at the _____ and _____ layers of the OSI model.
A copper or fiber cable connects customer premise equipment (CPE) to the service provider's nearest _____.
The physical _____ point is the place where the responsibility for the connection changes from the user to the service provider.

A _____ is a WAN device that converts digital signals to analog format for transmission over an analog line and then convert this analog signal back to digital form so that it can be received and processed by the receiving device on the network.
The _____ field in WAN frame formats is not needed because WAN links are almost always point-to-point.
A _____ switching network is one that establishes a dedicated channel between nodes and terminals before the users may communicate.
A _____ switching network does not require a dedicated channel between nodes. Many pairs of nodes can communicate over the same channel.
